docs.snippet: Kolten Wong, 23, gains perspective from his mother’s death as he looks for a fresh start on the baseball field after ending his 2013 season on a game-ending pickoff in the World Series....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kolten Wong, 23, gains perspective from his mother’s death as he looks for a fresh start on the baseball field after ending his 2013 season on a game-ending pickoff in the World Series.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column discusses St Louis Cardinals second baseman Kolten Wong, who is trying for a fresh start after tough year in which his mother died; notes Wong feels motivated by struggles in the previous season, including Game 4 of the World Series, when he became the first player ever to be picked off to end a World Series game.

headline.main: A Cardinal’s Inspiration to Move Ahead
headline.print_headline: A Cardinal’s Inspiration to Move Ahead

docs.snippet: C. C. Sabathia pitched three regrettable innings in the Yankees’ 3-2 preseason loss Tuesday, but said he was in a better position at this point in camp than he was last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: C. C. Sabathia pitched three regrettable innings in the Yankees’ 3-2 preseason loss Tuesday, but said he was in a better position at this point in camp than he was last year.
docs.abstract: Washington Nationals beat New York Yankees, 3-2, in preseason game; starting Yankees pitcher C C Sabathia brushes off poor performance in three innings.

headline.main: Sabathia Is Encouraged by an Outing, in Part Because It’s Only March
headline.print_headline: Sabathia Is Encouraged by an Outing, in Part Because It’s Only March
